key_risks: Clinical and regulatory risks due to uncertainty in clinical trial outcomes and potential delays in regulatory approvals
Dependence on external funding for R&D, despite a strong current cash position
High competition in the GPCR-targeted drug market
Scientific and technical challenges in GPCR biology and drug design
controversies: Lawsuit from former CFO alleging sexual harassment and domestic violence
social_issues: Legal challenges involving allegations of sexual harassment and domestic violence
governance_issues: Legal and ethical controversies impacting company reputation and investor confidence
